events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle on the morning of May 9th, requesting to initiate a claim for damages.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under 'Auto Accident' due to the involvement of the insured car in a traffic collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the case, ensuring prompt and professional assistance for the customer.
The customer was contacted to acknowledge receipt of the claim and to provide an overview of the next steps for processing.
The agent requested submission of the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and driver’s license to continue the investigation.
All requested documentation including police report and vehicle damage photos were submitted by the customer within the deadline.
A thorough investigation was initiated to verify the details of the accident and assess liability and damages reported.
The investigation concluded successfully confirming the accident circumstances and damage extent as reported by the insured.
A settlement offer was prepared and sent to the customer based on the damage assessment and policy coverage.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the timely communication.
The claim was officially approved by the underwriting team following agreement on the settlement terms.
Payment corresponding to the approved claim amount was issued to the customer’s registered account promptly.
The claim process was completed and officially closed after successful payment and customer confirmation.
All claim documentation and correspondence were securely archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
